705514f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lott Street - Snyder Avenue
705514f-a.folder: Lott Street & Snyder Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705515f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lott Street - Snyder Avenue
705515f-a.text:
Lott Street, north from Snyder Ave., to Erasmus Street.
September 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCTIONS.
705515f-a.folder: Lott Street & Snyder Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706821f-a.title: Brooklyn: Snyder Avenue - Lott Street
706821f-a.text:
(1)
102-10B Snyder Ave., south side, at Lott Street, showing the hone
of Peter Van Strom, said to have been built in 1737, at Flatbush Ave.,
and Martense Street, and moved to its present site in 1888.
March 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, from another angle. (The Peter Van Strom home was a
tavern in its early days).
March 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(3)
The same, at a later date.
June 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
706821f-a.folder: Snyder Avenue & Lott Street, Brooklyn, NY
